alertDetailsOverride.alertnameFormat: Alert from Authomize - Refactor AWS policy based on activities in the last 60 days
alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Refactor AWS policy based on activities in the last 60 days. This is a recommended update to IAM policy on AWS. Review the policy and apply it according to change control process. Authomize will have a recommended policy to be downloaded.

properties.query:
Authomize_v2_CL
| where ingestion_time() >= ago(30m)
| extend EventID = id_s, Policy = policy_name_s, Severity = severity_s,Description = description_s,Recommendation = recommendation_s,URL = url_s,Tactics = tactics_s
| where Policy has "Refactor AWS policy based on activities in the last 60 days."
| project  EventID, Policy, Severity, Description, Recommendation, URL, Category, Tactics
properties.description: This is a recommended update to IAM policy on AWS. Review the policy and apply it according to change control process. Authomize will have a recommended policy to be downloaded.
properties.name: Refactor AWS policy based on activities in the last 60 days
